short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Styles the ETHZ study portal "MyStudies" so you won't immediately get eye cancer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NEW IN VERSION 1.4:
This version fixed OhMy!Studies to make it compatible with the newest version of myStudies.

NEW IN VERSION 1.2:
Added dark mode!

Are you tired of having to gather information from all four corners of your 30 inch 4k monitor?

OhMy!Studies is a handy extension that applies minor style changes to the ETHZ myStudies Homepage to make it more readable and user-friendly, without interfering too much with the overall layout.

The extension automatically activates when you visit any subpage of myStudies. No further setup or permissions are required.
